DOC.brief_summary: This project measure baseline stress among group youth foster kinship care . The investigator implement pilot program target stress reduction use evidence-based group therapy technique teach mindfulness skill . The investigator hypothesize mindfulness skill help youth reduce stress , measure use psychological physiological technique .
DOC.brief_title: HEALTHY ( Health Education Adolescent Leadership Training Help Youth ) Leaders
DOC.criteria: age 1421 year time intervention offer , offer youth home care ( e.g . foster kinship care ) severe developmental delay non English speaking , age range
